title: Samsung shipping iMac-like 32-inch Smart Monitor M8 with AirPlay
content:
First unveiled at CES back in January, Samsung has officially launched its new Smart Monitor M8. The 32-inch display with a very iMac-inspired design comes with a solid range of features like Apple’s AirPlay, built-in/removable webcam, USB-C connectivity, and more with starting price of $699.

more…

The post Samsung shipping iMac-like 32-inch Smart Monitor M8 with AirPlay appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Samsung's Smart Monitor M8 iMac-like 32-inch 4K display with built-in webcam, AirPlay, USB-C, and more is now available to order.
